name: PUNCH MAN
description:
Story

All you know, is that you are a boxing man, and as a boxing man, you know you must punch. 

Controls

Using our amazingly awesome punching controller, you simply start by extending your arm out straight and then: 

Make a flexing motion to start the game/replay

Extend out arm (punch) to hit enemies

Pull arm back to reset punch

Click the right side of the mouse to navigate level/exit game.
